name: part_006
file: tmp_【3D Birthday Live】I'll Be Your Angle Or Yuor Devil #HELLoHALO [CLxtrooDlP8]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_006.mov

scenes.description: MC section. Ouro Kronii introduces herself and her new original song.
Performance of Ouro Kronii's second original song 'Souten ni Moyu'.

subtitles.original: あー、だんだん、もう一度笑ってくれるかな
subtitles.english: Ah, gradually, I wonder if you'll laugh for me one more time.

subtitles.original: メーデー　僕を叱ってよ
subtitles.english: Mayday, scold me.

subtitles.original: 正直者が夢見たいなら
subtitles.english: If an honest person wants to dream...

subtitles.original: ハイ、メーデー　僕を裁いてよ
subtitles.english: Hey, mayday, judge me.

subtitles.original: 最後まで甘やかしてしまうのは
subtitles.english: To indulge me until the very end...

subtitles.original: レイデー　僕を暴いてよ
subtitles.english: Rayday, expose me.

subtitles.original: 真実を歩くこの世界から
subtitles.english: From this world walking on truth.

subtitles.original: ハイ、メーデー　僕と踊ってよ
subtitles.english: Hey, mayday, dance with me.

subtitles.original: 最初からいないゴーストだった
subtitles.english: I was a ghost who wasn't there from the start.

subtitles.original: イェーイ...
subtitles.english: Yeah...

subtitles.original: ラヴなんだって知れないよ
subtitles.english: I don't even know what love is.

subtitles.original: イェーイ...
subtitles.english: Yeah...

subtitles.original: 嘘つきだって知れないよ
subtitles.english: I don't even know if I'm a liar.

subtitles.original: 亡霊だって知れないよ
subtitles.english: I don't even know if I'm a ghost.

subtitles.original: 空白だって知れないよ
subtitles.english: I don't even know if I'm a blank space.

subtitles.original: どうだっていいことを嘘って吐いて戻れない
subtitles.english: I spit out lies about things that don't matter and can't go back.

subtitles.original: 時効なんてやってこない　奪ったように奪われて
subtitles.english: The statute of limitations never comes, being stolen from just as I stole.

subtitles.original: And we're back!
subtitles.english: And we're back!

subtitles.original: You know, I'm really starting to like this new me.
subtitles.english: You know, I'm really starting to like this new me.

subtitles.original: What do you think? Eh? Eh?
subtitles.english: What do you think? Eh? Eh?

subtitles.original: I mean, I'm starting to kind of think it's real cool.
subtitles.english: I mean, I'm starting to kind of think it's real cool.

subtitles.original: And, uh, I just realized I didn't introduce myself properly back there. My bad!
subtitles.english: And, uh, I just realized I didn't introduce myself properly back there. My bad!

subtitles.original: Well, my name is Ouro Kronii and I am the Warden of Time.
subtitles.english: Well, my name is Ouro Kronii and I am the Warden of Time.

subtitles.original: Kuro-nichiwa!
subtitles.english: Kuro-nichiwa!

subtitles.original: And I, after much waiting, have finally done it.
subtitles.english: And I, after much waiting, have finally done it.

subtitles.original: We're here. We've made it. It's taken a long time.
subtitles.english: We're here. We've made it. It's taken a long time.

subtitles.original: Kroma also apologizes for the delays, but...
subtitles.english: Kroma also apologizes for the delays, but...

subtitles.original: ...finally, my second original song, Souten ni Moyu, will be coming out soon.
subtitles.english: ...finally, my second original song, Souten ni Moyu, will be coming out soon.

subtitles.original: Sooner than you think.
subtitles.english: Sooner than you think.

subtitles.original: And thank you so much for waiting. Um, I hope you haven't forgotten it.
subtitles.english: And thank you so much for waiting. Um, I hope you haven't forgotten it.

subtitles.original: But yes, here is my second original song, Souten ni Moyu.
subtitles.english: But yes, here is my second original song, Souten ni Moyu.

subtitles.original: 蒼天に燃ゆ / Lyrics: スピア / Composition・Arrangement: ko.yo
subtitles.english: Burning in the Azure Sky / Lyrics: Spia / Composition・Arrangement: ko.yo

subtitles.original: 其れは俄の夢か
subtitles.english: Is that a fleeting dream?

subtitles.original: 灰色の都　笑われて
subtitles.english: Being laughed at in the gray city.

subtitles.original: 噛み締めた尊き声
subtitles.english: The precious voice I held back.

subtitles.original: 過去の静寂を灯す
subtitles.english: Lighting up the silence of the past.

subtitles.original: ダイスを転がして　何時しか繋ぐこの時代
subtitles.english: Rolling the dice, connecting this era before I knew it.

subtitles.original: 運命さえ断つだろう　掻き分ける人の波へ
subtitles.english: I'll even sever fate, into the waves of people pushing through.

subtitles.original: 矜持を燃やして　時の声　鐘を鳴らせ
subtitles.english: Burn your pride, the voice of time, ring the bell.

subtitles.original: 其の手を伸ばせ　届きそうな明日なんてつまらないだろう
subtitles.english: Reach out your hand, a tomorrow that seems reachable is boring, isn't it?

subtitles.original: 瞳は炎の色　刻み隠した其の業を
subtitles.english: Eyes are the color of flames, that karma carved and hidden away.

subtitles.original: 其の手を翳せよ　大概な期待まで
subtitles.english: Hold up your hand, even to excessive expectations.

subtitles.original: 沈む宵闇彩ろどに　限界なんて越えていけ
subtitles.english: To the colors of the sinking twilight, go beyond the limits.

subtitles.original: 解き放たれる日まで　戦場を駆けろよ
subtitles.english: Until the day I'm set free, run through the battlefield.

subtitles.original: 迷いよ　去れよ　刺激を求ました舞いな
subtitles.english: Hesitation, begone, dance as you sought stimulation.

subtitles.original: 弱きを導いた運命のその先へ
subtitles.english: To the end of the fate that guided the weak.

subtitles.original: ダイスを転がして　流れに身を任せ
subtitles.english: Rolling the dice, entrusting myself to the flow.

subtitles.original: 慈愛さえ断つだろう　想いを研ぎ澄ませて
subtitles.english: I'll even sever affection, sharpen your feelings.

subtitles.original: 鋼のように　固めた意思を添えよう
subtitles.english: Like steel, let's offer up a hardened will.

subtitles.original: 矜持を構えて　時の声　鐘を鳴らせ
subtitles.english: Ready your pride, the voice of time, ring the bell.

subtitles.original: 瞳を抱いて　煌めいて
subtitles.english: Embrace your eyes, sparkle.

subtitles.original: 迷わぬオールイン　弾みで行く　空気が火を滾らせ
subtitles.english: Unwavering all-in, going with the momentum, the air makes the fire boil.

subtitles.original: 瞳に不滅の色　其の手に懸けた火にくちづけを
subtitles.english: Immortal color in the eyes, a kiss to the fire placed in that hand.

subtitles.original: 其の手を翳せ　届きそうな明日なんてつまらないだろう
subtitles.english: Hold up your hand, a tomorrow that seems reachable is boring, isn't it?

subtitles.original: 瞳は炎の色　刻み隠した其の業を
subtitles.english: Eyes are the color of flames, that karma carved and hidden away.

subtitles.original: 其の手を翳せよ　大概な期待まで
subtitles.english: Hold up your hand, even to excessive expectations.
